New Records: LeBron James moved ahead of Michael Jordan on the all-time list of 30-point games in the NBA
Key Match Events: The Los Angeles Lakers won 119-102 against the Atlanta Hawks
Post-Match Reflections: The Lakers improved to 20-14 in 34 games and are now the fourth seed in the Western Conference
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James averages 24.1 points, 7.4 rebounds, and 8.9 assists per contest while shooting 50.7% from the field and 38.2% from the three-point range
Others: The Lakers are in the middle of a two-game winning streak and have gone 7-3 over their last ten games
